name: FAST DRIVE: Extreme Race & Drift
description:
FAST DRIVE: Extreme Race & Drift is a dynamic racing game in which you play as a driver performing illegal tasks. Local gangs will learn about your arrival and will want to eliminate you. We will find out who comes out on top: you or them. Complete missions, become a master of escape or pursuit, drift, overcome obstacles and make breakneck jumps. Practice your skills to become a driving master.



You're in a futuristic city full of car gangs. Develop your driving and shooting skills to better protect yourself from any attacks. Go on missions to take over territories, businesses, glory, and rule. This will provide you with funds to upgrade your vehicle.

You have a car at your disposal, that you can boost, tune, paint, as well as customize its components and looks in order to become even better and faster driver.

Key Features:

  • a cool car that you can tune
  • opponents
  • vehicle and environment physics
  • various missions
  • unique graphics
  • drifts, jumps, chases, shoot-outs
  • additionally - controller support
  • physics adjusted to comfortable ride during constant road turns at high speed
  • physical interaction with strange cars and the city
  • complex map with gps function
  • possibility of changing your ride type into drift at any time

Weapon description:
  • side missiles - remotely controlled missiles that go off after they reach an obstacle They work on long distances in any direction. If they hit the strange vehicle, they take away about 80% of lives.
  • a net - it covers the strange vehicle in front of us. As a result, it stops and gets destroyed in about 60%.
  • physical boxes - when they are released from the car trunk, they become a heavy obstacle. After a minute, they explode and destroy the strange vehicles located nearby. They take away about 0-80% of lives.
